text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ, an aghuir ruarim ko an ganganiba deraghtɨ, kɨ a ginabagham. Puvatɨ. Gumazir kam, atrivimɨn otivan kɨ aghua. Guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God, gumaziba biziba tuisɨsi moghɨn, biziba tuisɨzir puvatɨ. Gumaziba uan damazibar inivafɨzibar gari. Ezɨ kɨ gumazibar nɨghnɨziba ko men ifongiabar gara me tuisɨsi.”
